name: WIN - Weird Is Normal (Demo)
description:
The hidden creature society has been in shock as a mysterious killer seems to be roaming the area. A young girl's corpse had been found, another girl has gone missing and the authorities are more desperate than ever to find the culprit.

This Demo contains Chapter 1 of the storyline WHITE.
Play as Rita, a Marish who decides to look into the murder case. Meet Whitney the Unicorn (a journalist), Edward the Angel (editor of the local newspaper), Trevor the Ghoul and Zarah the Banshee (police officers). Make your first steps into befriending either and all of them and learn about the start of a serial killer.
With a special choice system that allows you to ignore a choice. Don't like the options? Ignore them. Want to run away in the middle of a conversation? Do so. At no point does the game force you to make a decision during a conversation.
Comes with full creature lexica, two different minigames, a CG Gallery, over 400 choices in just Chapter 1.

Note: Includes accessibility features in the preference settings to disable flashing lights, rain and more.
Due to it's unique choice system, both controllers and screen readers might not be useable with this game or cause issues.
